blocks.css: p-4 mt-6 shadow-lg hover:text-blue-300 text-lg bg-indigo-500 hover:bg-black
blocks.label: Button

blocks.css: text-lg px-4 my-4 mt-8 md:w-4/5 m-auto
blocks.label: Rich Text
blocks.content:
I am web developer since last 20 years and I love my job.


I worked on most relevant web technologies available trying to improve and learn all new emerging solutions.


Give the customer the right solution has always been my real idea about my job.


Understanding the real customer needs has alway been my ultimate scope.


Exploring new technologies and use them as business solutions is a daily job to keep me updated and well informed about the IT panorama related to web technologies.


I totally embrace the open source model and all my public repos are open source and free.


I like to be part of a community to share resources and support for any help.


I am also a musician and producer with more then 10 years experience in studio recording and music production.
